thread.title: Algeria: France Willing Strengthen Partnership With Algeria in Renewable Energy, Stresses Royal
thread.title_full: Algeria: France Willing Strengthen Partnership With Algeria in Renewable Energy, Stresses Royal

title: Algeria: France Willing Strengthen Partnership With Algeria in Renewable Energy, Stresses Royal
text:
Morocco: AU Commission Chairperson Reiterates Firm Position for Decolonization of Western Sahara 
Algiers — French Minister for Ecology, Sustainable Development and Energy Segolene Royal expressed Saturday in Algiers France's willingness to strengthen the partnership with Algeria in renewable energy. 
"France and Algeria should strengthen their partnership particularly in the areas of renewable energy, the circular economy (processing waste into raw material) and subjects related to biodiversity," she said at a press briefing at the end of her two-day visit to Algeria. 
She hailed Algeria's commitment to increase the share of renewables in electricity production up to 27% in 2030, dubbing this goal "ambitious". 
Besides, Royal expressed in this regard France's willingness to promote bilateral partnership in water management and sanitation. 
Referring to the Paris Conference on Climate Change (COP-21), scheduled for December, Royal affirmed France needs a country like Algeria to ensure its success. 
Representatives from 195 countries are expected to attend COP 21 to negotiate under the auspices of the UN, a global agreement to curb global warming. 
During this conference, Algeria will plead for a "fair and balanced" agreement taking into account the historical responsibility of industrialized countries for global warming, according to the Ministry of Water Resources and Environment. 
"My trip to Algeria was successful because I exchanged with Algerian officials on the Mediterranean issue of ", she added. 
During her visit, Royal was received by several Algerian officials, including President of the Republic Abdelaziz Bouteflika and Prime Minister Abdelmalek Sellal. 
She also visited several facilities working in the field of the protection of environment. Algeria
